en-US.content: Fix n-transfer list doesn't follow container height when style.height is set, closes #1879.

Fix n-form's blankHeightXxx theme var doesn't follow common.heightXxx, closes #1880.
Fix n-date-picker's panel doesn't use dateFormat in locale, closes #1793.
Fix n-log text color transition in theme switching.
n-switch can no longer be clicked under loading status, closes #1853.
Fix n-data-table 's horizontal scrollbar disappears when max-height is not set, closes #1857.
Fix n-input-number cannot input negative decimals value, closes #1858.
Fix n-dialog open new dialog again when pressing enter key, closes #1559.
n-button can no longer be clicked under loading status, closes #1628.
Fix n-alert's header slot unable to display normally.
Fix n-data-table's pagination onUpdatePageSize prop does't trigger, closes #1774.
Fix n-data-table can select rows when table is loading, closes #1812.
Fix n-tag line-height is too low that clamps the content.
Fix n-select displays with mistake in input if filterable is true, closes #1823.
Fix n-page-header's content has margin-top when header is not displayed, closes #1795.
Fix n-avatar's inner icon has wrong size.

Fix n-radio click event will be triggered twice, closes #1680.
Fix n-data-table layout display incorrect when the table is empty and min-height set, closes #1809.
Fix n-data-table fixed group column box-shadow error and right fixed column order error, closes #1832.
Fix n-data-table's header fixed column style on data is empty.
n-data-table will check all if indeterminate header checkbox is clicked, closes #1827.
n-button uses n as CSS vars prefix, closes #1808.
Fix n-input click clear icon does't trigger change event, closes #1754.
Fix n-input-number the cursor moves when press arrow keys to change value, closes #1759.
Fix n-date-picker has no placeholder when type is year.
Fix n-upload still shows upload trigger when max limit is reached in image-card mode, closes #1744.
Fix n-upload is displayed vertically in n-form in image-card mode, closes #1746.
Fix n-upload's file list's top margin if trigger is hidden.
Fix n-upload shows normal file status when response has 4xx status, closes #1741.
n-data-table will ignore children with length 0 in tree data mode, closes #1703.
Fix n-theme-editor throw error when click button component, closes #1708.
Fix n-input's color is abnormal in Android WeChat, closes #1705.
Fix n-input 's borderHover theme variable doesn't work, closes #1704.
Fix n-data-table's header & body may have wrong border radius, closes #1712.
Fix n-button's colorOpacityXxx theme vars are not string typed.
Fix n-slider disabled tooltip at the wrong time.
Fix n-slider incorrect fill color style, closes #1670.
Fix n-data-table's pagination onUpdatePage prop trigger twice, closes #1666.
Fix n-log's trim prop not being independent when used.
Fix n-slider processing of step value precision.
Fix n-date-picker throw error when time-picker input is empty, closes #1678.
Fix n-scrollbar's scrollbar will vanish if clicked.
Fix n-popover has an invalid line in style.
Fix n-input-number can't accept indeterminate input value when max or min is set, closes #1664.
Fix n-input-number's input value is not changed to a valid value if it's input exceeds min or max multiple times.
n-popover provides better auto position adjustment, closes #1520, #1643.
Fix n-image drag the picture to move the position incorrectly when the zoom is large.
Fix n-data-table style glitches after some rows are expanded.
Fix n-data-table doesn't expand tree data correctly, closes #1644.
NButton.fontWeightText & NButton.fontWeightGhost theme vars are removed. If you want to change font weight, you can use strong prop of n-button instead.
Bypass Vitejs bug on string extrapolation, ref #636.
Fix the default value of the suffix internal component's loading property.
Fix n-space is shown when it has no children, closes #1605.
Fix n-button will trigger click event twice if pressed, closes #1626.
Fix n-grid suffix NGridItem does not set right span when collapsed, closes #1530.
Fix n-button to shrink abnormally in certain scenarios when using the circle prop, closes #1557.
n-menu add a color distinction between selected and unselected arrow, closes #1535.
Add createLocale to make locale customizable, closes #1525.
Fix n-alert contentTextColor and titleTextColor type theme variable not working, closes #1495.
Fix n-time-picker not trigger blur event when the panel is closed by ok button, closes #1499.
Fix n-button keyboard prop does not work, closes #1508.
Fix n-tabs switch tab does not work when adding a new tab, closes #1417.
Fix n-tree's filter prop does not work when assigned children-field , closes #1477.
Fix n-cascader can't remove options when using customized fields in multiple mode.

Fix n-select menu height shifts on close in filterable mode.

n-collapsed-transition's collapsed prop is deprecated, please use show instead, closes #1407.

n-data-table optimize the logic of underlying rendering and improve component performance.
n-input of text type supports count slots, closes #1440.

Fix n-upload's disabled prop's style not working, closes #1237.
Fix n-ellipsis's expand-trigger prop not show pointer cursor when content is short, closes #1299.
Fix the list-style style of the <ul> element.

Fix n-form-item's content is too long and the width is incorrect

Fix n-grid-item won't work with responsive config.

Fix n-global-style applies style transition on first mount.

n-layout-sider's arrow-circle trigger is changed into new style.
